verses.verse: Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> seeing we have <S%G2192><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> ministry, <S%G1248><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> we have received mercy, <S%G1653><s%> we faint <S%G1573><s%> not; <S%G3756><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> have renounced <S%G550><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> hidden things <S%G2927><s%> of dishonesty, <S%G152><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> walking <S%G4043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> craftiness, <S%G3834><s%> nor <S%G3366><s%> handling the word of God deceitfully; <S%G1389><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3056><s%> <S%G2316><s%> but <S%G235><s%> by manifestation <S%G5321><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> truth <S%G225><s%> commending <S%G4921><s%> ourselves <S%G1438><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> man's <S%G444><s%> conscience <S%G4893><s%> in the sight <S%G1799><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> <S%G2532><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> gospel <S%G2098><s%> be <S%G2076><s%> hid, <S%G2572><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> hid <S%G2572><s%> to <S%G1722><s%> them that are lost: <S%G622><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> god <S%G2316><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world <S%G165><s%> hath blinded <S%G5186><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> minds <S%G3540><s%> of them which believe not, <S%G571><s%> lest <S%G3361><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> light <S%G5462><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> glorious <S%G1391><s%> gospel <S%G2098><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the image <S%G1504><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> should shine <S%G826><s%> unto them. <S%G846><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> we preach <S%G2784><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> ourselves, <S%G1438><s%> but <S%G235><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> the Lord; <S%G2962><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> ourselves <S%G1438><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> for Jesus' sake. <S%G1223><s%> <S%G2424><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> who commanded <S%G2036><s%> the light <S%G5457><s%> to shine <S%G2989><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> darkness, <S%G4655><s%> hath <S%G3739><s%> shined <S%G2989><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> hearts, <S%G2588><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> give the light <S%G5462><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> knowledge <S%G1108><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the face <S%G4383><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> treasure <S%G2344><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> earthen <S%G3749><s%> vessels, <S%G4632><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> excellency <S%G5236><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> power <S%G1411><s%> may be <S%G5600><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> us. <S%G2257><s%>

We are troubled <S%G2346><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> every side, <S%G3956><s%> yet <S%G235><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> distressed; <S%G4729><s%> we are perplexed, <S%G639><s%> but <S%G235><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> in despair; <S%G1820><s%>
Persecuted, <S%G1377><s%> but <S%G235><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> forsaken; <S%G1459><s%> cast down, <S%G2598><s%> but <S%G235><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> destroyed; <S%G622><s%>

Always <S%G3842><s%> bearing about <S%G4064><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> dying <S%G3500><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> might be made manifest <S%G5319><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> body. <S%G4983><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> which live <S%G2198><s%> are always <S%G104><s%> delivered <S%G3860><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> for Jesus' sake, <S%G1223><s%> <S%G2424><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> might be made manifest <S%G5319><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> mortal <S%G2349><s%> flesh. <S%G4561><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> We having <S%G2192><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> same <S%G846><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> of faith, <S%G4102><s%> according as <S%G2596><s%> it is written, <S%G1125><s%> I believed, <S%G4100><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> therefore <S%G1352><s%> have I spoken; <S%G2980><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> believe, <S%G4100><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> therefore <S%G1352><s%> speak; <S%G2980><s%>

Knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he which raised up <S%G1453><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> shall raise up <S%G1453><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shall present <S%G3936><s%> us with <S%G4862><s%> you. <S%G5213><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> are for your sakes, <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5209><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> abundant <S%G4121><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> might through <S%G1223><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> thanksgiving <S%G2169><s%> of many <S%G4119><s%> redound <S%G4052><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

For which cause <S%G1352><s%> we faint <S%G1573><s%> not; <S%G3756><s%> but <S%G235><s%> though <S%G1499><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> outward <S%G1854><s%> man <S%G444><s%> perish, <S%G1311><s%> yet <S%G235><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> inward <S%G2081><s%> man is renewed <S%G341><s%> day by day. <S%G2250><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2250><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> light <S%G1645><s%> affliction, <S%G2347><s%> which is but for a moment, <S%G3910><s%> worketh <S%G2716><s%> for us <S%G2254><s%> a far more exceeding <S%G2596><s%> <S%G5236><s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5236><s%> and eternal <S%G166><s%> weight <S%G922><s%> of glory; <S%G1391><s%>

While we <S%G2257><s%> look not at <S%G4648><s%> <S%G3361><s%> the things which are seen, <S%G991><s%> but <S%G235><s%> at the things which are not seen: <S%G991><s%> <S%G3361><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> the things which are seen <S%G991><s%> are temporal; <S%G4340><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> the things which are not seen <S%G991><s%> <S%G3361><s%> are eternal. <S%G166><s%>
